page.title: 19HOME LIFE ST LEONARDS
page.content: I am Matthew and I live in{St Leonards which is about 3 miles from Ringwood and 5 from{Ferndown.}In the village are three shops, a park, the Parish Church and a hut for Cubs, Scouts, Brownies and Guides. They go to Church Parade once a month. There is a tennis club and you need to be a member to play on the courts. My Dad is one of the men who helped build, and who now maintain, the play park. This is next to the recreation ground where I (Glen) train for running and football. There are two football pitches and a Bowling Club. There is a steep hill nearby where we go to sledge and ride our bikes. There is a tree stump at the bottom of the hill which is why we call it "Devil's Hill". There are several new housing estates in{ {St Leonards}which have been built on what used to be farmland.
